message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $18000? This price not only reflects the true value but also ensures you receive the best possible deal. Let's make this a win-win situation for both of us.
